title: FastestVPN offers ad blocking, anti-malware software, and more for $32
content:
Macworld

Finding an affordable VPN can be tricky. However, finding one that can protect multiple devices without sacrificing speed can be a little more challenging.  

Thankfully, you can enjoy the best of both worlds and plenty more with FastestVPN. This VPN offers speed, ad blocking, malware protection, and more for only $31.97 (reg. $360) until June 26!

Whether you’re an Apple fan or Android stan, FastestVPN can protect almost any device, from smart TVs to your MacBook and router. Secure up to 10 devices with this VPN and enjoy P2P optimized servers that help you avoid dreaded buffering when streaming the latest from Hulu.

Even if you add FastestVPN to all 10 of your devices, it won’t fail you with speed, thanks to its over 600 high-speed servers in 50 countries worldwide. Not only that, FastestVPN can help you bypass geo-restrictions, so you can watch your favorite movie even if it’s not available on Netflix in the U.S.

Security is essential for any VPN, and this one doesn’t fall short. It’ll protect your information and devices with its military-grade 256-bit AES encryption and uses protocols like OpenVPN, IKEv2, IPSec, OpenConnect, and L2TP to secure your internet.

Make your browsing, streaming, and gaming experience more secure with a lifetime subscription to FastestVPN, now just $31.97 until June 26 at 11:59 PM Pacific.
